ai-patthana16.46:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.46:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of a regular meal.
ai-patthana16.46:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor for the sake of repulsion, only with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.46:1.1_1: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor for the sake of sustained thought doesn’t give rise to the cause of repulsion. ...
ai-patthana16.46:1.1_2: because of not doing so, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.46:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion regarding what is not unsuitable for the sake of not grasping.
ai-patthana16.46:2.1_1: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor for the sake of grasping, nor for the sake of repulsion, not for the sake of being conditioned.
ai-patthana16.46:2.1_2: because of not doing so, there are no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.46:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
